The '''Master Torturer''' is the apparent leader of the men holding [[Theon Greyjoy]] prisoner. He's a torturer serving [[House Bolton]] under the command of [[Ramsay Snow]], the [[Bastardy|bastard]] son of [[Roose Bolton]], and [[castellan]] of [[the Dreadfort]].
